text: Bassem Balaa, born July 10, 1981 in Beirut Lebanon, is a retired Lebanese professional basketball player He has also represented the Lebanon national basketball team that participated in the 2002 FIBA World Championship in Indianapolis and the 2006 FIBA World Championship in Japan. Bassem has played for various clubs within Lebanon, including Lebanese giants Sporting Al Riyadi Beirut and Achrafieh side Hekmeh BC. == References == == External links == * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Lebanese men's basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Beirut Category:Basketball players at the 2006 Asian Games Category:Small forwards Category:2006 FIBA World Championship players Category:Asian Games competitors for Lebanon
title: Bassem Balaa
